pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, July 3, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, July 3, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario 

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will depart for Dublin, Ireland.

Canada Reception Centre (Hangar 11)
Macdonald-Cartier International Airport

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity of departure
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.

Dublin, Ireland

9:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive in Dublin, Ireland.

Dublin International Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity of arrival


Note: all times local
